### About Myself
In 2025 I completed my fourth year of my undergraduate degree in Honors Economics at Saint Mary's University in Halifax, NS. During my time there, I developed a strong interest in econometrics, machine learning and labour economics. I'm now pursuing my MA in Economics at the University of Waterloo, where my current research is in labour and sports economics. My long-term goal is to complete a PhD in Economics and secure a position as an assistant professor.
